We would like to reserve Room A for approx 15 ppl next month for a workshop.
Could you share available dates? Language: en.

Sara

message.subject: Subject: Booking Inquiry – Product Launch Presentation, March 2025
message.body:
Subject: Booking Inquiry – Product Launch Presentation, March 2025
Body:
Dear Events Team,
We’re planning to host a product launch presentation for our new tech line and are looking for a venue in Zurich.
Preferred date: March 20, 2025 (Thursday), ideally afternoon to evening (around 14:00 – 20:00).
Expected attendance: about 45 people.
Requirements:
– Stage area and screen for presentation
– Standing apéro setup afterward
– Parking nearby if possible
Please let us know if you have any suitable rooms available and what the setup options are.
Best regards,
Markus Hofmann
Marketing Manager, Nova Devices AG
markus.hofmann@novadevices.ch
+41 78 345 22 10

payload.note:
Subject: Booking Inquiry – Product Launch Presentation, March 2025
Body:
Dear Events Team,
We’re planning to host a product launch presentation for our new tech line and are looking for a venue in Zurich.
Preferred date: March 20, 2025 (Thursday), ideally afternoon to evening (around 14:00 – 20:00).
Expected attendance: about 45 people.
Requirements:
– Stage area and screen for presentation
– Standing apéro setup afterward
– Parking nearby if possible
Please let us know if you have any suitable rooms available and what the setup options are.
Best regards,
Markus Hofmann
Marketing Manager, Nova Devices AG
markus.hofmann@novadevices.ch
+41 78 345 22 10

Subject: Booking Inquiry – Product Launch Presentation, March 2025
Body:
Dear Events Team,
We’re planning to host a product launch presentation for our new tech line and are looking for a venue in Zurich.
Preferred date: March 20, 2025 (Thursday), ideally afternoon to evening (around 14:00 – 20:00).
Expected attendance: about 45 people.
Requirements:
– Stage area and screen for presentation
– Standing apéro setup afterward
– Parking nearby if possible
Please let us know if you have any suitable rooms available and what the setup options are.
Best regards,
Markus Hofmann
Marketing Manager, Nova Devices AG
markus.hofmann@novadevices.ch
+41 78 345 22 10

message.subject: Subject: Team Offsite – Looking for Venue Options
message.body:
Subject: Team Offsite – Looking for Venue Options
Body:
Hi there,
We’re organizing our annual team offsite for around 18–20 people and would love to host it at your venue.
We’re thinking sometime in late spring, ideally a Friday, and would need:
– Workshop setup (U-shape or boardroom style)
– Projector and flipcharts
– Light lunch and coffee breaks
Could you please share some available dates and rooms that might suit such a setup?
Thanks in advance!
Best,
Elena Gruber
Operations Coordinator, Helix Analytics GmbH
elena.gruber@helix-analytics.ch
+41 44 987 23 45

payload.note:
Subject: Networking Event – Availability for May 8 2025
Body:
Dear Event Team,
We’d like to organize a networking evening for our business partners on Thursday, May 8 2025, in Basel.
Expected attendance: around 60 guests.
We’d need a cocktail / standing setup, with bar tables, sound system for background music, and light catering (finger food + drinks).
Ideally the event would run from 18:00 to 22:00.
Could you please confirm availability and recommend suitable rooms?
Many thanks,
Julia Steiner
Corporate Relations Manager, Alpine Finance AG
+41 79 222 66 14
julia.steiner@alpinefinance.ch

message.subject: Subject: Training Workshop – 2-Day Booking Request in June
message.body:
Subject: Training Workshop – 2-Day Booking Request in June
Body:
Hello,
We’re planning a two-day internal training workshop for our support team and are looking for a venue in Zurich or nearby.
Preferred dates: June 12–13 2025 (Thursday & Friday).
Participants: about 25 people.
Requirements:
– Classroom or U-shape setup
– Projector + whiteboard
– Lunch and two coffee breaks per day
– On-site parking if available
Could you please let us know if you have availability for those dates and what package options you recommend?
Thank you,
Nadine Keller
Training Coordinator, Solvion Tech AG
nadine.keller@solviontech.ch
+41 79 880 91 22
07:50
